amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the Remote Operations Center be located in the town of Superior, Arizona, or adjacent to another mining community within the Copper Triangle.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 113-215 to guarantee the jobs this mine does create benefit the local community by requirin g that the Remote Operating Center be located in the town of Superior, Arizona or an adjacent mining community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 227 (Roll no. 489).
